headline: Co-founder & CTO at Lumina (YC W22) | Forbes 30 under 30 | Jobs, Careers, AI, Startup
summary:
Strong engineering & product leader with proven track record in building anything zero to one and scaling them beyond what everybody thought was possible.

Currently building Lumina to empower 270 million underserved Indonesians to work for a better life. Lumina has secured fundings from Y Combinator & Alpha JWC.

Previously I help build GudangAda to revolutionize FMCG logistics and supply chain (with $135m+ raised from Sequoia Capital, Falcon Edge, Asia Partners, and Alpha JWC).

Prior to GudangAda, I was part of the founding team at STOQO where I helped built the core products and scaled the engineering team from 1 to 40 in three years. The company raised funding from top VCs in the region (Accel Partners, Monk's Hill Ventures, Insignia Ventures, and Alpha JWC Ventures).

Previously, I worked at Twitter in San Francisco and several fast-growing startups in Indonesia (GDP Labs, Dekoruma, Cermati). I was a competitive programmer throughout my high school & university years, and coached students who then won medal in national & international levels.

I'm interested in Agriculture, Education, and Economic Empowerment. On the weekend, I'm building Akselito, a coaching platform to help students and fresh graduates build a fulfilling career.

I read classics & works of philosophy as a hobby.

experiences.title: Co-founder & CTO
experiences.description: Build the team & product from the ground up. Achieved 1 million users within 6 months after launch.

experiences.title: Fellow
experiences.description: Accepted into a highly selective program for early-stage founders building the future of learning and work.

experiences.title: Global Shaper
experiences.description: The Global Shapers Community is a network of young people driving dialogue, action and change initiated by the World Economic Forum.

experiences.title: VP of Engineering
experiences.description: Building high-performing technology teams from scratch. GudangAda is Southeast Asia's biggest B2B marketplace with $135m+ raised from Sequoia Capital, Falcon Edge, and Asia Partners. Acting VP of Product (July 2020 - April 2021): Led product management, strategy, and design for logistics, transport, pricing, and warehousing products.

experiences.title: Engineering Advisor
experiences.description: Sirka is a wellness technology company funded by Y Combinator, Sequoia Capital, and Wavemakers Partners. Helping hire engineers, build products, and guide technical direction.

experiences.title: Founding Team & Engineering Manager
experiences.description:
Founding team & 1st engineer at B2B fresh produce startup (raised $10m+ from Accel Partners & Monk's Hill). Started as an engineer then moved into leadership.

Built teams from 1 to 40+ engineers in 2 years, led the implementation of most core products.

experiences.title: Co-founder & CTO
experiences.description:
Started out as my passion to help grow people and promote fulfilling careers. We build mentorship, job search, and CV creation platform to help anyone upgrade their working life.

Invited for Y Combinator Winter 2020 batch final on-site interview with YC partners (Top 5% of applicants).

experiences.title: YC 120 Fellow
experiences.description: Invited by Y Combinator to a premier YC 120 program comprised of 100 driven individuals and 20 individuals who are already at the top of their field. We believe that having a strong network is such a force multiplier for anyone who wants to have a significant impact on the world.

experiences.title: Mentor
experiences.description: Indo2SV is a 5-months mentorship program from fellow Indonesian professional for Indonesian university student to help them secure internship at top tech companies in Silicon Valley.

experiences.title: Co-founder (side project)
experiences.description: Developed web-based product and business model of an internship match-making platform for talented Indonesian students & tech companies. Won 1st place in national collegiate business competition.

Computer Science Olympiad Team, GENIUS Competition IT Commitee

Selected as a team from more than 25 thousand applicants.
